name: HEDE Game Engine
description:
Have you always dreamed of becoming a game developer?
You have found the place where you can let your imagination go - it's HEDE Game Engine!

At the current state, you can't make a build of your game. You can play it only inside our game engine.

The main game features:
- a game engine type where you can give place to your imagination;
- create a variety of 2D games from available sprites;
- use the mouse and keyboard to create;
- share your creations;
- and let your friends play them.
